mapper.insert: insert into board ( name, id, email, subject, content, hit, logtime, bcode, mseq , status) values ( #{name}, #{id}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now(), #{bcode} , #{mseq}, 1)
insert into reboard ( seq, ref, lev, step, pseq, reply) values ( #{seq}, #{ref}, 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select b.seq, b.name, b.id, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.logtime, b.bcode,b.mseq, r.rseq, r.ref, r.lev, r.step, r.pseq, r.reply from board b, reboard r where b.seq = r.seq and b.seq = #{seq}
